Title: Camp de Thiaroye
Writer: Ousmane Sembene (dialogue), Ousmane Sembene (screenplay), Thierno Faty Sow (dialogue), Thierno Faty Sow (screenplay)
Actors: Sidiki Bakaba, Hamed Camara, Ismaila Cissé, Ababacar Sy Cissé
Plot: In this semi-autobiographical film, black soldiers help to defend France, but are detained in prison camp before being repatriated home.
